# delegate

**Instance Property**

The layout manager’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any NSLayoutManagerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Managing the layout process

- **NSLayoutManagerDelegate**: A set of optional methods that delegates of layout manager objects implement.

items.description: A set of optional methods that delegates of layout manager objects implement.
